sections.paragraph: + Second son of Simeon, (Genesis46:10; Exod 6:15; 1Chr 4:24 Founder of the family of the Jaminites. (Numbers 26:12) (B.C. 1706.) + A man of Judah, second son of Ram the Jerahmeelite. (1 Chronicles 2:27) + One of the Levites who expounded the law to the people. (Nehemiah 8:7) (B.C. 410.)
